POWERED by FUSION

An individual post follows.

More Long-Time-No-Updatage

I’m in the midst of a pleasant holiday, and I hope most of you are too. I’m out of town for eight
days starting tomorrow, perfecting my weapons satellites at an undisclosed location in the Southern
Hemisphere. On the off-hours, my reading consists of
magic,
cyberpunk,
cyberpulp
(+1),
futurism,
and new
mythology.

I promise a more regular update schedule, and even some aesthetic improves, when I return. The lack
of a functioning version of open AFS client Arla makes editing my blog a remote affair,
rather than the networked-but-same-as-local power of Arla/AFS. As you can imagine, that slows things
down a bit. Solutions will be, uhm, soluted and more in the New Year. I resolve as much. Cheers all.

—Dec 27, 2002
